posts.post_content: For trade my T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait BVG 1.5. I want one just like it but different.  Will trade with cash added for right card.  I just want a darker red background.   Cans be lesser grade with right back.  I got plenty of others to make right trade. Picture will be added in the morning
Next time, but this in the Buy/Sell/Trade sections and not the main discussion board.
